spell.name: Corrosive Blast
entries: A spew of acrid chemicals erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 10d4} acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The acid destroyed any objects made of organic materials in the spell's area. A creature killed by this spell has its flesh entirely dissolved, leaving behind only a corroded skeleton.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the acid damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
